timeline.message: Add build failed column to ProgrammingSubmission
Migrate build artifact from result to ProgrammingSubmission
Set build failed boolean based on response from CI system
Adapt client to refactored programming submission fields

timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.6.xsd">
+    <changeSet id="20200117213324-1" author="ungar">
+        <addColumn tableName="submission">
+            <column name="build_artifact" type="Boolean" defaultValueBoolean="false">
+                <constraints nullable="false" />
+            </column>
+        </addColumn>
+    </changeSet>
+    <changeSet id="20200117213324-2" author="ungar">
+        <sql>
+            update submission
+                set build_artifact = true
+                where discriminator = 'P'
+                and id in (
+                    select submission_id
+                    from result
+                    where build_artifact

timeline.bodyText: do not delete, but deprecate it for easier migration
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: remove and execute this changelog some days later for easier migration
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.6.xsd">
+    <changeSet id="20200117213324-1" author="ungar">
+        <addColumn tableName="submission">
+            <column name="build_artifact" type="Boolean" defaultValueBoolean="false">
+                <constraints nullable="false" />
+            </column>
+        </addColumn>
+    </changeSet>
+    <changeSet id="20200117213324-2" author="ungar">
+        <sql>
+            update submission
+                set build_artifact = true
+                where discriminator = 'P'
+                and id in (
+                    select submission_id
+                    from result
+                    where build_artifact
+                )
+        </sql>
+    </changeSet>
+    <changeSet id="20200117213324-3" author="ungar">
+        <dropColumn tableName="result" columnName="build_artifact" />

timeline.message: Revert removal of buildArtifact for compatibility issues
